snippet.title: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon - Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2022
snippet.description: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon has a dark, gripping atmosphere which descended onto the Future Games Show, revealing gameplay from Awaken Realms Digital’s open-world RPG, which is coming to Steam Early Access in Q4 2022.
